Class TextFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Mk.TextFile

extends java.lang.Object
    Static class for reading from / writing to text files
    Author:
    Motyak

      • read

        public static java.lang.String read(java.lang.String filePath)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Read file content
        Parameters:
        filePath - the absolute path of the targeted file
        Returns:
        the content of the targeted file as a String
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there's a problem finding/reading the file

      • write

        public static void write(java.lang.Object stringable,
                         java.lang.String filePath)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Write stringable to file (overwrite if exists, otherwise create it)
        Parameters:
        stringable - the content to write into the file, will use 'toString()' implementation
        filePath - the absolute path of the file to create
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there's a problem finding/writing the file

                                        int nbOfLines)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Read a file and return an overview of it
        Parameters:
        filePath - the absolute path of the targeted file
        nbOfLines - the overview length
        Returns:
        an overview of the targeted file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there's a problem finding/reading the file

                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Rename a file
        Parameters:
        dirPath - the directory containing the file to rename
        fileName - the name of the file to rename
        newFileName - the new file name
        Throws:
